s1_title: Wi-Fi Enabled Smart LED Light Strip
s2_text:
Apple HomeKit technology provides an easy, secure way to turn your
                    connected light strip on or off, set light colors or adjust light brightness using the Koogeek Home app and Siri on your iPhone, iPad, iPod touch, or Apple Watch.
s3_text: Shape the 2-meter light strip to desired forms and use the adhesive tape on the back to attach it to most clean, dry and flat solid surface. It can flexibly contour around corners and highlight architectural features. If needed, you can cut your Smart Light Strip to size at the scissor markings.
s4_text: Offer 16 million colors to choose from and every color is dimmable in the Koogeek Home app, your can match the light to your mood and personalize your home.
s5_text: Create scenes and control multiple HomeKit-enabled light strips with different light colors and brightness at the same time. Turn a scene on or off by tapping it, setting a timer or just asking Siri.
s6_text: Set custom schedules and timers for a light strip or a scene to turn connected light strips on or off at a specific time automatically.
s1_text: Connect it to a USB power source. Configure it from the Koogeek Home app over a 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi network. No hub or bridge required.
s8_text: You can set up your Apple TV or iPad as a home hub to control your HomeKit accessories remotely, grant access, and automate your accessories.
